name: mediawiki-mcp-server
description: This server allows you to manage MediaWiki, the software that powers Wikipedia, using MCP.

tools.name: mediawiki_edit
tools.description: Create or edit a MediaWiki page.

tools.name: mediawiki_get
tools.description: Get the content of a MediaWiki page.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: Title of the page to edit

examples.title: Get a page
examples.description: Get the content of the 'Main Page' on mediawiki.org.
examples.prompt: Get the content of the 'Main Page' on mediawiki.org, then print it to the screen

examples.title: Summarize a page
examples.description: Get a page and then summarize it.
examples.prompt: Get the content of the 'Community portal' page on mediawiki.org, then summarize it.
